SMBus Data Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x10
Size:
0x4

Description

Single byte data for simple transactions

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:8] reserved r 0x0 Reserved
[7:0] data rw 0x0 Data Byte

Field Descriptions

reserved - Reserved

Reserved bits

data - Data Byte

Data byte for Send/Receive Byte transactions
